mdfs.client.api
Class FileQueryImpl

java.lang.Object
  mdfs.client.api.FileQueryImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
FileQuery
public class FileQueryImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements FileQuery

This is a basic implementation of FileQuery where the user gains access to a MDFS - file system that is specified in mdfs/config/config.cfg

Author:
Rasmus Holm

rm

public boolean rm(java.lang.String path,
                  java.lang.String flag)
Description copied from interface: FileQuery
Removes a file or dir from MDFS. If no flag is used it only removes files or empty dirs only. to recursively remove a dir and all its content use flag 'r'

Specified by:
rm in interface FileQuery
Parameters:
path - - the relative or absolute path to the file to be removed.
Returns:
true if successful, false otherwise.
